titleStmt.title: A commission for the due and effectual assessing and leavying of the fourth part of the yearly value of lands, & of the yearly increase or profit of stocks, and other personal estate in the prespective precincts in Ireland; for, and towards the pay of the armie.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Commissioners of the Common-wealth of England for the Affairs of Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
